body: These ornate and heavy blades are mounted atop a long, steel-shod haft for greater reach. They are rare among cave-dwelling dwarves but common in mountain dwarf clans that commonly feud with giants.
name: Longaxe, Dwarven
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Dwarves/New Racial Rules/Dwarven Equipment/Longaxe/Dwarven
